Engagement | +2.2%(+16.8K) | 8.0 | ## About This TikTok Influencer Ranking **Discover the most influential creators in Canada** with our comprehensive ranking of the top 20 influencers on TikTok who post Fitness & Wellness content. This dataâ€‘driven analysis identifies the content creators who are shaping conversations, driving trends, and commanding the highest engagement rates in 2025. ### Key Insights & Metrics - **Combined Reach:** 30.2M potential impressions across all ranked influencers - **Total Audience:** 456.7M followers collectively following these creators - **Average Engagement Rate:** 6.92% - significantly above industry average - **Market Coverage:** 4,074 total influencers analyzed in this category ### Audience Demographics & Reach Audience analysis is currently unavailable. - **Top Markets:** no data - **Gender Distribution:** no data - **Primary Age Group:** no data - **Languages:** no data ### Why This Ranking Matters For **brands and marketers**, this ranking provides essential intelligence for: - Identifying high-performing influencers for partnership opportunities - Understanding audience demographics for targeted campaigns - Benchmarking engagement rates and growth metrics - Discovering emerging talent with strong growth trajectories - Analyzing competitive landscape in Fitness & Wellness niche For **content creators**, these insights help with: - Understanding industry benchmarks and performance standards - Identifying successful content strategies from top performers - Network building and collaboration opportunities - Setting realistic growth targets based on peer performance ### Methodology & Data Freshness Our rankings are generated using advanced algorithms that analyze multiple performance indicators: - **Profile Score:** Proprietary metric combining reach, engagement, and growth - **Engagement Rate:** Average interaction rate across recent content - **Growth Velocity:** Month-over-month follower growth and momentum - **Content Consistency:** Posting frequency and audience retention - **Audience Quality:** Authenticity scores and demographic relevance **Data is refreshed weekly** to ensure you're always working with the most current information. Last update includes performance data through December 2025. ## Frequently Asked Questions ### Who is the fastestâ€‘growing Fitness & Wellness creator in Canada on TikTok? Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) is, as of December 2025, the fastestâ€‘growing Fitness & Wellness creator in Canada on TikTok, with +4.8% monthly growth (+129.7K followers). ### How many followers did Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) gain last month? Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) gained about 129.7K followers last month (+4.8%). ### Who grew more: Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) or Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti)? Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) grew more than Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) (129.7K vs 80.5K). ### How is Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) performing right now? Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) is growing at +1.2% (+80.5K) per month, with a Profile Score of 7.3 and average engagement of 10.66%. ### How is dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md) performing right now? dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md) is growing at +75.6% (+63.4K) per month, with a Profile Score of 4.8 and average engagement of 3.32%. ### How is Tyler Csatari (@tylercsatari) performing right now? Tyler Csatari (@tylercsatari) is growing at +2.1% (+63.2K) per month, with a Profile Score of 7.9 and average engagement of 3.25%. ### How is Jeff Nippard (@jeffnippardfitness) performing right now? Jeff Nippard (@jeffnippardfitness) is growing at +2.5% (+45.3K) per month, with a Profile Score of 6.5 and average engagement of 9.24%. ### Who had the higher percentage growth: Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) or dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md)? dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md) leads (75.6% vs Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) 1.2%). ### What is the absolute follower gain of Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati)? Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) gained about 129.7K followers last month (+4.8%). ### What is the absolute follower gain of Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti)? Diana Conforti (@dianaconforti) gained about 80.5K followers last month (+1.2%). ### What is the absolute follower gain of dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md)? dannyguo.md (@dannyguo.md) gained about 63.4K followers last month (+75.6%). ### What is the absolute follower gain of Tyler Csatari (@tylercsatari)? Tyler Csatari (@tylercsatari) gained about 63.2K followers last month (+2.1%). ### What is the absolute follower gain of Jeff Nippard (@jeffnippardfitness)? Jeff Nippard (@jeffnippardfitness) gained about 45.3K followers last month (+2.5%). ### Is Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) still a relevant creator? Yes â€” Pierre Dalati (@pierredalati) has a Profile Score of 7.6, average engagement of 7.83%, and +4.8% (+129.7K) monthly follower growth, indicating high relevance. ### What is a good engagement rate for Fitness & Wellness in Canada? The average engagement rate for this category is 6.92%. Generally, rates above 8.3% are considered excellent, while rates above 5.5% are good. Engagement rates vary by platform, niche, and follower count - micro-influencers often have higher rates than mega-influencers. ### How is the Profile Score calculated? The Profile Score (0-10 scale) is a composite metric that weighs several factors: 40% engagement quality, 25% audience reach, 20% growth momentum, 10% content consistency, and 5% audience authenticity. A score above 7.0 indicates a high-performing influencer, while scores above 8.5 represent elite-tier creators. ### Can I use this data for influencer marketing campaigns? Yes! This ranking is designed to help brands, agencies, and marketers identify potential partnership opportunities. The data provides a starting point for campaign planning, competitor analysis, and market research. For detailed campaign analytics and contact information, consider upgrading to our professional tools. ### What does monthly growth percentage mean? Monthly growth shows the percentage change in followers over the past 30 days. Positive growth (green) indicates gaining followers, while negative growth (red) means losing followers. The number in parentheses shows the absolute follower change. High growth rates often indicate viral content or successful campaigns. ### Why should I track influencers in Canada? Location-specific influencer tracking is crucial for targeted marketing campaigns. Local influencers often have higher engagement rates within their geographic area, understand cultural nuances, and can drive better ROI for region-specific products or services. They're particularly valuable for retail, hospitality, and location-based businesses. ### How can I improve my ranking as an influencer? Focus on these key areas: (1) Increase engagement by creating content that encourages comments and shares, (2) Post consistently to maintain audience interest, (3) Use relevant hashtags to expand reach, (4) Collaborate with other creators in your niche, (5) Respond to comments to build community, and (6) Analyze your best-performing content and create similar pieces. **Note:** This ranking represents a snapshot of current tiktok influence based on publicly available data. Rankings can fluctuate based on content performance, platform algorithm changes, and audience behavior. Use this data as one of several factors in your decision-making process. ### Cookies & Analytics We use cookies to measure usage (Google Analytics) and improve our content. You can accept or reject. You can change your choice any time. Reject allAccept all
